meanings: (기억 속에서 지워 버리다) forget, put[get] sb[sth] out of one's mind[head]

vlive.korean: [덕분에 잊었던 통키 소환] - 나 통키를 까먹고 있었어. - 그래. I forgot about Tongki. - Right. 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처2 ep53_피구 끝판왕 성난 종국의 등장
워낙 빨리 먹어서 내가 잠깐 잊었던 거지. I ate them really quickly so I must have forgotten about them... 듣기 View video stellar : 핑크방으로 드루왓~!
vlive.english: I ate them really quickly so I must have forgotten about them...

vlive.korean: 조금 잊었던 예절들을 되새기면서 다시 알았으면 좋겠어요. other people will remember these manners as well. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : 우주소녀 이미지 증발 버라이어티 <우소보쇼> 4화
vlive.english: other people will remember these manners as well.

vlive.korean: [차오루의 등장에 잠시 잊었던 혁수 형] 꼭 이럴 때는 형 안 부르더라! [They forgot Hyuksoo being surprised by Cao Lu] You never call me in such cases! 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : [FULL]더 보이즈 '꽃미남 분식집' 5회 The BOYZ "Flower Snack" ep.5
vlive.english: [They forgot Hyuksoo being surprised by Cao Lu] You never call me in such cases!

vlive.korean: 우리 룰 잊었냐? Did you forget our rule? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 요즘 너만 보면 자꾸 커진단 말이야 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP3
